titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lord General and his councel of officers; shewing the grounds and reasons for the dissolution of the late Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
England and Wales. Council of State.
